    <!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_header -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300 __970x90" id="fragranticacom_perfume_header" v-pre>

        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 </a></div><div style="clear:both;"></div></div><div><sup>Sponsored</sup></div></div><div class="cell show-for-medium medium-6" style="padding: 0.6rem;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="43037" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="43037" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.34</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="630">630</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="74"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Roaring Radcliff</b> by <b>Penhaligon's</b> is a Aromatic Spicy fragrance for men. <b>Roaring Radcliff</b> was launched in 2016. The nose behind this fragrance is Daphné Bugey. Top notes are Rum, Bergamot and Tarragon; middle notes are Tobacco, Ginger and Rose; base notes are Honey, Beeswax, Cinnamon, Tonka Bean, Leather and Amberwood. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>Penhaligon's: "Being secretly the son of Lord George and Clandestine Clara certainly explains Radcliff’s weakness for the flesh, but his illegitimacy may have its advantages. Unburdened by title or propriety, Radcliff indulges in fast cars and even faster women - his raison d’être parties and provocation. A prominent note with Roaring Radcliff is of course tobacco - strong, smoky and distinctive to his set. He also always carries with him gingerbread - adding its sweet spiciness to his father’s love of liquor - in Rutherford’s rum. Sexy and rebellious - what well-bred girl would not succumb to his charm? As he is wont to whisper in their inclining ears… The night is young…"</p>

<p>The nose behind this fragrance is Daphné Bugey. Top notes are bergamot, tarragon and rum; middle notes are ginger, rose and tobacco; base notes are amberwood, beeswax, cinnamon, honey, leather and tonka bean. </p>

<p> Available as a 75 ml EDP.</p></div><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a </pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Base Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="base"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; </pyramid-level></pyramid-switch></div></div><div class="cell text-center"><button class="button small" data-open="NotesRatingModal">Vote for Ingredients</button></div></div><notes-rating :perfume_id="43037"></notes-rating></div><div class="cell small-12"><vue-encrypt-postscribe slotid='d8b70f7f8b3ec875da8395f8cc27fdb1211' slotpayload='{"ct":"QFjnp2UmrH1x0gsuGWToKjN6udJPCTAmvbBa2YCK2\/kqPFG+o49EjNTRWWc5XfCQMie28nwyNhUKA5jag0qSQy9cNHirH9j2GfdbENvjucnmNBu4h9KPwpO0qflpkdDomN1G+YEZ\/2iymAPgFzSwgcBm614bCPli6tCdBRy6iPMEtfbkAugHxCvOQzC3XvhcAPUrey7ZU87UdbVfwjjTkyAegmqiXbh9+9ToUxG9wEVeyScn9irsC5a4b5Ou9JI1Dc0ZclzjfK6paT14XvUUGy8jDEZ6Jh6vBRku86Uzh\/nxOcDahimfq3Dq5QGBCFoN","iv":"70449fbf4a52fbe6e0379773c81d6c59","s":"685297753daae254"}'></vue-encrypt-postscribe></div><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-padding-y"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_3 -->

    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2364423" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dinaina"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1464376"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1464376.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dinaina" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Kilian/Love-Don-t-Be-Shy-4322.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4322.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Love Don't Be Shy"title="Love Don't Be Shy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2364423ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2364423" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1464376">Dinaina</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-28">11/28/24 16:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of the best fragrances for men I have ever laid my nose on. Criminal to discontinue this masterpiece.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="2364423"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=2364423#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2329635" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2329635" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CuddleWithCorpses"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1962192"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1962192.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="CuddleWithCorpses" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Scents-of-Wood/Oud-in-Bourbon-69984.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.69984.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud in Bourbon"title="Oud in Bourbon"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2329635ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2329635" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1962192">CuddleWithCorpses</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-27">10/27/24 18:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This stuff is amazing. Whoever at Penhaligans that decided to discontinue this should be shot into the sun. Such a shame.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="2329635"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=2329635#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2290099" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2290099" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="The Wolf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263755"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1263755.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="The Wolf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Blanc-Kogane-88629.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.88629.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Blanc Kogane"title="Blanc Kogane"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2290099ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2290099" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263755">The Wolf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-21">09/21/24 02:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Really nice honyed cinnamon tobacco. In the opening I get the tarragon and citrus and the ginger gives it a bit of zing. I never really understood the TF tobacco vanille comparison but after my 3rd wearing I noticed a similarity after a few hours, but for the most part, it does it's own thing. I like honey tobacco fragrances like vintage Kilian B2B but what I appreciate here is they didn't make it so sickly sweet, so it's easier for me to tolerate the opening compared to the Kilian. The rum is very subdued here but not nearly as faint as the brandy used in Lord George. I guess heavy booze just isn't part of Penhaligon's ethos, although gin is noticeable for a little while in Much Ado about Duke. Overall a strong release and I plan to nab a bottle at some point. Leans masculine.<br />
------------------------------------------------------<br />
Scent 90/100<br />
Performance 74/100</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="2290099"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=2290099#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2255055" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2255055" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ansary"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1796286"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1796286.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ansary" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2255055ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2255055" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="2255055"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=2255055#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2159732" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2062003" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Miracle.Fragrance"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1369006"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1369006.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Miracle.Fragrance" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2062003ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2062003" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); the smell of sexy tobacco honey, I tried it with Tobacco Vanille TF, for me this smells sexier. but I heard that this perfume has been discontinued, very regretful, hopefully I can still find it another time.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="2062003"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=2062003#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2051069" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2051069" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Natasssa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1050145"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1050145.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Natasssa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Frederic-Malle/Carnal-Flower-1024.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1024.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Carnal Flower"title="Carnal Flower"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2051069ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2051069" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1050145">Natasssa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-03">02/03/24 11:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Roaring Radcliff by Penhaligon's is the epitome of an enchanting Aromatic Spicy fragrance that has gracefully stood the test of time. This scent, over the years, maintains its allure and mystique, continuing to captivate with its timeless charm.<br />
<br />
Perfect for cool evenings and intimate moments, Roaring Radcliff envelops you in a rich, warm embrace without overwhelming sharpness or aggressive top notes. It's a fragrance that whispers of sophistication and confidence, making it the perfect choice for those who seek a well-crafted and alluring perfume.<br />
<br />
As you delve into the scent, you'll find yourself immersed in the intoxicating blend of rum, bergamot, and tarragon – a concoction that embodies the essence of refined indulgence. The fragrance unfolds like a carefully written novel, revealing layers of tobacco, ginger, and rose in its heart. It's a captivating journey from the first spray to the lingering base notes, leaving an unforgettable trail of honey, beeswax, cinnamon, tonka bean, amberwood, and leather.<br />
<br />
What sets Roaring Radcliff apart is not just its aromatic complexity but its distinctive presence. This fragrance possesses a unique character, quietly asserting its influence without being overly ostentatious. Unfortunately, its elusive nature has led to its discontinuation, adding a layer of exclusivity to its allure. It's a fragrance that not only withstands the test of time but remains a benchmark for sophisticated, mysterious scents. In a sea of fragrances, Radcliff by Penhaligon's stands as an original masterpiece, leaving an indelible mark on those fortunate enough to experience its enigmatic charm.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="2051069"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=2051069#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2028527" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1809922" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gandrasta"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/15995"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.15995.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="gandrasta" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/M7-1031.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1031.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="M7"title="M7"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1809922ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1809922" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/15995">gandrasta</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-15">04/15/23 21:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's surprisingly pleasant. Not striking yet present at the right amount of gestalt. Honey, rum, tobacco and tonka played their part perfectly. Meanwhile a prominent creamy tone orchestrated all of them in such harmony. Great fragrance, really</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="1809922"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=1809922#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1783063" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1783063" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Vikkinca"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1345893"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1345893.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Vikkinca" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1783063ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1783063" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1345893">Vikkinca</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-14">03/14/23 04:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A review of a clone of Roaring Radcliff called Georgian's The Lion Heart by Armaf:<br />
<br />
Fragrance Note Pyramid:<br />
Top: Bergamot, Cinnamon.<br />
Middle: Tobacco, Ginger, Rose.<br />
Base: Honey, Tonka, Amber Wood, Leather.<br />
<br />
Bottle Size: 100ml.<br />
Price: $38.<br />
<br />
This moves from Tobacco Vanille to Naxos to Herod. Yes, I know, I know. That sounds great, doesn't it😊 <br />
<br />
On first spray you're thinking this is just another take on Tobacco Vanille - a lighter, sweeter, less linear version. Wait about two hours and you start smelling the honey and cinnamon more prominently, balancing out the scent of tobacco. The sweetness is reminiscent of Naxos. In the late dry-down it might be the rose and Tonka bean that lifts the scent to something akin to Herod. I know there's no rose note in Herod, but the way it's blended here, it appears to be the note - along with the Tonka bean I suspect - that transitions the honeyed tobacco to a scent quite close to Herod. All the while maintaining that Tobacco Vanille backbone.<br />
<br />
I must've sniffed both my arms a thousand times; it is that beautiful a fragrance. I'd say more masculine. Georgian's The Lion Heart lasts at least 12 hours - I was still smelling it on me long after I'd showered. Certainly not redundant if you love tobacco fragrances, like I do, or if you have any or all of the three others I have mentioned in my review. <br />
<br />
A magical clone of Roaring Radcliff in scent and presentation✨</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="1783063"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=1783063#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1758530" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1758530" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="modalee81"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/203581"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="modalee81" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Cedrat-Boise-15211.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.15211.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cedrat Boise"title="Cedrat Boise"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1758530ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1758530" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/203581">modalee81</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-12">02/12/23 14:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like TF TV</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1718404" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lithohydrobio"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1237458"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1237458.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lithohydrobio" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/DS-Durga/Salem-Gothic-86328.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.86328.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Salem Gothic"title="Salem Gothic"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1718404ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1718404" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1237458">lithohydrobio</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-27">12/27/22 10:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The idea was there to be vintage and classy but it wasnt executed in a modern way. Profile wise it Reminds me of Ralph Lauren Chaps from the 70s but chaps is better.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="1718404"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=1718404#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1706705" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1706705" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ularewolf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/461474"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.461474.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ularewolf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1706705ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1706705" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/461474">ularewolf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-10">12/10/22 22:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To me, this smells nothing like TV. This is an extremely smooth, fairly linear beeswax, honeyed tobacco with some vanilla to give it that sweet finish. Yes, it has tobacco and vanilla but I find this to be more of a honey and beeswax scent instead. The drydown is literal heaven, because it gets the nice body from the vanilla and it grounds the scent.<br />
<br />
I will probably have to get this sooner rather than later in case it actually is discontinued. Amazing stuff.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="1706705"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=1706705#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1677276" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1677276" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jeremia"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1347057"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jeremia" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/hima-jomo/Autumn-in-Lhoka-74497.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.74497.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Autumn in Lhoka"title="Autumn in Lhoka"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1677276ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1677276" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1347057">Jeremia</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-30">10/30/22 05:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've had the luck of buying this beauty a few days ago in a town near by, here in Italy. I've had a sample from the blue juice version and it was very spicy and sweet from the honey, loved it..but when i bought a full bottle, i got the Brown juice one, and oh my god, this is something unbelievable, Tobacco Vanille ? Yes, but is much classier, elegant. A bit gourmandish, but a smidge, nothing close to a full gourmand. It's spicy, with much more tobacco (early on is very dry on me) the honey gives it a comfortable feeling that envelopes you and into the dry down.<br />
<br />
 This smells like late fall-winter-christmass, ginger bread and tobacco. Simply amazing. I love when perfumes houses take a famous fragrance and tweak it, refine it and put their own spin on it. <br />
<br />
9.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="1677276"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=1677276#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1675625" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1675625" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Victor Lahovary"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1143312"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1143312.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Victor Lahovary" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Impudent-Cousin-Matthew-53875.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53875.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Impudent Cousin Matthew"title="The Impudent Cousin Matthew"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1675625ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1675625" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1143312">Victor Lahovary</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-27">10/27/22 15:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is what Tom Ford's Tobacco Vanille was presumably supposed to be, and everything that it was not. The addictive blend is this time a promise well kept, and not a beautiful bride(-groom) jilted at the altar. The roaringly sweet - boozy - tobacco-inspired spicy scent is a more than pleasant discovery of the present, now that it is no longer available on the market, except in time-forgotten shops and at extravagant prices from questionable sources.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="1675625"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=1675625#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1659094" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This drives me insane, with my partners skin chemistry this is just magic (but I am also particularly weak on honey). Not strong, but it radiates around like a comforting cloud. This is boozy spicy honey cinnamon roll, but make it dark and sexy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="1623952"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=1623952#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1588602" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1588602" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Toluspinn"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1337151"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1337151.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Toluspinn" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Vertus/Monarch-47924.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.47924.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Monarch"title="Monarch"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1588602ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1588602" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1337151">Toluspinn</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-21">06/21/22 08:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of the finest frags in my collection, the smell is heavenly and yeah it's got similarities to Tom Ford Tobacco Vanille in its dry down.<br />
<br />
A shame the incredible scent couldn't be matched by an equally incredible performance.. I wish this last longer.<br />
<br />
Edit: after few weeks of allowing this sit on my shelf, it's easily one of my favourite at the moment, the performance is not bad after all, 6 to 7 hours on my skin and lasts the whole day on clothes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="1588602"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=1588602#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1581394" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Initially when I first sprayed it, I got a lot of rum but then quickly turned into a sweet honey/beeswax scent. Shorty after that the tobacco came in and made this quite mature. Varies in longevity 4-7hrs</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="1540811"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=1540811#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1496108" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1496108" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="*loves_shoes*"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1407258"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1407258.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="*loves_shoes*" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Babycat-73149.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.73149.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Babycat"title="Babycat"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1496108ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1496108" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1407258">*loves_shoes*</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-02">02/02/22 05:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love, love, love.<br />
Totally unisex. <br />
Sweet honey and smooth tobacco with warmth from the cinnamon and ginger, and a gorgeous depth from everything else.<br />
Everything combines to give a boozy feel, rum or cognac.<br />
Simply stunning. <br />
This will be worn a lot in the colder months and Christmas.<br />
Grab a bottle while you can.<br />
<br />
Edit 12 hours later and it’s still there as a skin scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="1496108"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=1496108#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1482719" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Sadly it is a discontinued fragrance as of December 2021. Smells of smokey honey, that has a warm touch from the spices and tobacco, followed by the sweetness of the honey and tonka beans</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="1482719"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=1482719#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1478867" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1478867" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ssamhita"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1420430"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1420430.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ssamhita" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mugler/Angel-Nova-Eau-de-Toilette-67863.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67863.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Angel Nova Eau de Toilette"title="Angel Nova Eau de Toilette"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1478867ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1478867" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1420430">ssamhita</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-08">01/08/22 07:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am a woman who loves floral dresses and red lipsticks and kitten heels and I have no qualms in admitting that I love wearing this perfume. In fact, I bought Clandestine Clara, The Blazing Mr. Sam and Roaring Radcliffe all at once and this turned out to be the best of the lot. On my skin this is sweet - the cinnamon amazingly smooth with that honey. It makes me think of a delicious concoction I would love to drink. The ginger offsets the sweetness beautifully. Once it settles down I get a hint of tobacco, but not much. When I wear this I feel like I am wrapped in a warm comforting cardigan that I want to pull closer around me. If a man wore this, I’m sure I’d want to keep sniffing them, over and over again. Sillage is intimate, which makes it even sexier in my opinion. After all, who doesn’t want to smell good enough to eat?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="1478867"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=1478867#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1462160" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1462160" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TienaHaven"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1360632"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="TienaHaven" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1462160ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1462160" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1360632">TienaHaven</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-12-12">12/12/21 12:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My signature scent since long. Of course, I love it and that’s why this smooth and amazing perfume is my signature scent. This is actually a sophisticated scent with the playful side with a super classy dry down that is beautiful and soft with the gingerbread smell. This is one perfect smell one dies for but the performance of this one is not beasty. The longevity and silage are moderate making it a bit expensive one. There is citrus on top that soon becomes powdery, soft tobacco with some of sweetness. This scent reminds me of Histoiries da parfums with the same kind of powdery and soft base. This is not regular gourmand or boring boisterous.  Best thing about this amazing perfume is a perfect and soft balance of thick set honey with the sweet tobacco. There is elegance and warmth in it making it more suitable for the cold nights, winters and fall. A cozy, warm, classy and enveloping kind of scent that makes me feel confident, seductive and relaxed over anything. Highly recommended if your in tobacco based scents.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="1462160"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=1462160#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1459729" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1459729" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Drcoyle34"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1212752"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Drcoyle34" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1459729ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1459729" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1212752">Drcoyle34</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-12-08">12/08/21 08:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ya know, this fragrance really chaps my hide! I bought an oil impression of this from Oil Perfumery and was instantly a fan. I know I had to have the real deal eventually. I ordered it and needless to say, I was severely let down. Yes, it smells wonderful no denying that!! The projection on this is about 10 inches it seems like. <br />
<br />
Longevity on my skin was about 4-6 hours. I was hoping that it would performance much better than it does. In a way, I feel like I was "sold a dream" but I understand that some fragrances become skin scents rather quickly. If only this juice had better sillage or something. Frustrating!! LOL</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="1459729"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=1459729#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1412208" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1412208" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gmaster"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1247000"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1247000.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="gmaster" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/James-Heeley/Agarwoud-13541.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.13541.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Agarwoud"title="Agarwoud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1412208ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1412208" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89); Very pleasant and as unisex as it gets. May easily become full bottle worthy as I explore it a little more with my sample.<br />
<br />
I do have to admit that the longevity is disappointing for the price point. 2 hours in and it becomes a faint honey scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="1412208"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=1412208#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1409547" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; They haven’t mentioned cardamom but I smell a lot of it here ! Wired is it my nose ? Have anyone noticed that ?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="1384886"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=1384886#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1320142" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="1320142"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=1320142#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1283379" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1283379" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Drcoyle34"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1212752"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Drcoyle34" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1283379ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1283379" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1212752">Drcoyle34</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-01-28">01/28/21 15:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is quite to scent to unpack. I'm writing my review based on the Oil Impression version from Oil Perfumery. I've smelled a sample of the original and it's spot on. Now for the review.. this is a great scent hands down! It's pretty potent off the bat with the rum, ginger, cinnamon, and beeswax slapping you in the face.  Its a darker mysterious and sophisticated scent imo. After about 2-4hrs or so, it begins to settle nicely and you start to smell more of the rose, gingerbread scent, tobacco, and honey come through. Longevity? 10+ hrs easily for me.<br />
<br />
This pretty much stays with hints of leather and tonka drifting by your nose. This is definitely a fall/winter scent. If you have cool spring nights where you live, then it'll work then too. This is a manly scent and I've gotten several compliments from ladies at work and out. Its my best winter scent to date. Fellas, if you are cooking dinner for your lady or on a night out, put on alil of this (neck/chest area). 4-6 hours later, she'll want to gobble you up lol. Don't sleep on it. Enjoy!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="1283379"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=1283379#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1281317" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1281317" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="uno"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263873"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1263873.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="uno" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1281317ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1281317" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);
