I have tested Tobacco Vanilla that many reviewers have said similar to Radcliffe. I don't get such similarity. And I prefer Radcliffe.<br />
Good for men and women.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="1281317"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=1281317#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1241294" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1241294" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Chicago Tony T"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/773746"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.773746.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Chicago Tony T" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rasasi/Daarej-pour-Homme-19688.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.19688.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Daarej pour Homme"title="Daarej pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1241294ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1241294" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/773746">Chicago Tony T</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-10-25">10/25/20 17:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Performance is the biggest issue with this fragrance. The smell is a perfect 10 but lacks any depth as longevity and sillage at best is moderate. You can pretty much look at this as a Tobacco Vanille Fraiche.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="1241294"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=1241294#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1233873" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1233873" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cam59"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1258168"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cam59" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1233873ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1233873" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1258168">Cam59</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-10-07">10/07/20 11:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My favorite fragrance. The dry down is soft but beautiful. I think this will be my signature scent. It is a sophisticated scent with a playful side. Scent off my skin and clothes is magical. I will respray just out of love for the scent. I cannot get enough of it. That warm gingerbread smell in the dry down is gorgeous. It wafts to the nose and I feel transformed. I cannot relate to comparisons to TF's TV. I cannot stand that scent. Yes, RR is on the expensive side but it's worth to me.<br />
<br />
10/10 scent</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="1233873"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=1233873#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1222495" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1222495" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hans.backe"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1242279"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1242279.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="hans.backe" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Prada-L-Homme-39029.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39029.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Prada L'Homme"title="Prada L'Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1222495ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1222495" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1242279">hans.backe</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-09-10">09/10/20 02:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>At the moment I’m wearing TF - TV on my right hand and Roaring Radcliff on my left hand.<br />
<br />
They are very similar; however I prefere Radcliff, it is a bit smoother, and you can smell some woody notes in the background.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="1222495"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=1222495#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1205088" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1205088" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="micavana"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/860758"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.860758.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="micavana" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.21548.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oajan"title="Oajan"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1205088ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1205088" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/860758">micavana</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-07-29">07/29/20 06:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A sweet honied tobacco that is slightly spicy and boozy with a hint of chocolate. This is compared to Tobacco Vanille, but I get more of a Boclet Tobacco vibe from this than a TV vibe, but I will admit that there is a bit of a TV vibe in this one. RR is a warm, rich and elegant scent with good projection and longevity on my skin. A very well blended scent.<br />
<br />
I can see this in any attire, ultra-casual, trendy casual or in a sports coat. Although this is marketed as unisex, I find it to be a bit more on the masculine side. <br />
<br />
If you like sweet tobacco scents, you should try a sample of this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="1205088"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=1205088#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1179311" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1179311" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="archiephillips"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1235761"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1235761.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="archiephillips" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1179311ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1179311" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1235761">archiephillips</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-05-23">05/23/20 10:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sprayed it on and immediately thought to myself: "Tobacco Vanille".<br />
It is very much in sweet and spiced tobacco category of fragrance. The opening is very reminiscent of the aforementioned Tom Ford, with maybe a touch of rum. I wouldn't call this an especially boozy fragrance, but my nose does not tend to pick up alcoholic notes very well. <br />
As it starts to dry down the ginger, cinnamon and tonka/honey create a very nice gingerbread accord alongside the tobacco. I also get quite a prominent beeswax note in the drydown, which is the main divergence from TV. I'm not especially fond of beeswax as a note to be honest, which did put me off a bit.<br />
The performance is not loud, but it will last for the whole night (this is an evening fragrance to me) which soft to moderate projection.<br />
At the end of the day, Roaring Radcliff smells great, but you will have smelled it before if you have been involved in this hobby for any length of time. It might be worth sampling if you're thinking of picking up Tobacco Vanille (or Tabac Rouge, etc.), but want to test the whole field before making a purchase. For me, the waxiness in the drydown means that there are better alternatives for my tastes. I love the baked goods vibe here, but I feel that that's also present elsewhere.<br />
<br />
I like it, but not bottle-worthy.<br />
<br />
(dislike/indifferent/like, but not BW/like a lot, potentially BW/love, definitely BW/masterpiece)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="1179311"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=1179311#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1176239" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1176239" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bearscents"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1238357"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bearscents" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1176239ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1176239" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1238357">Bearscents</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-05-15">05/15/20 16:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A very nice scent, but the performance on my skin is sub par. If your skin does not make fragrances mega-project, stay out. Otherwise the price tag will make you cry.<br />
<br />
Scent: 8/10<br />
Longevity: 4/10<br />
Projection: 2/10<br />
Bottle design: 9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="1176239"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=1176239#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1161477" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1139277" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mrushrush"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1192798"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="mrushrush" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1825.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tobacco Vanille"title="Tobacco Vanille"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1139277ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1139277" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1192798">mrushrush</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-01-29">01/29/20 00:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I bought full bottle after I sampled this in Rome airport and gosh what a nice scent.<br />
Very sophisticated, warm and classy.<br />
Beeswax and tobacco leaves dominate.<br />
Longevity 5-6 hours. Projection 2-3 hours.<br />
It's worth buying for those who like to smell elegant.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="1139277"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=1139277#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1111951" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1111951" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Zanthulu"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1210603"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1210603.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Zanthulu" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1111951ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1111951" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1210603">Zanthulu</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-11-02">11/02/19 12:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This perfume is absolutely lovely. Fresh tobacco leaves, beeswax and honey and nice citrus there to balance it out.<br />
<br />
This is fragrance-wise a personal favourite, but the projection is non-existent on me and the scent quite literally disappears after about 30 minutes.<br />
<br />
For the price paid, I'd have expected better performance, a real shame.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="1111951"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=1111951#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1066518" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1066518" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Angeldaisy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/903180"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.903180.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Angeldaisy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Acqua-di-Parma/Acqua-Nobile-Iris-17487.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.17487.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Acqua Nobile Iris"title="Acqua Nobile Iris"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1066518ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1066518" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/903180">Angeldaisy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-06-02">06/02/19 14:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>smells like chocolate violets to begin with.<br />
the tobacco leaves warms through with a dash of chai latte.<br />
very sweet, thick, dry (dusty) and syrupy if all of those are possible.<br />
a bit Organza Indecence for men.<br />
there is something lost in the dry down for me.<br />
amber woods take hold, i smelt them after 20 minutes, before i saw the notes. <br />
cannot for the life of me smell tarragon and i love tarragon, i smell a nice tea note instead.<br />
a truly pleasant fragrance, but the ingredients perhaps spoil the refinement of this sweet powder for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="1066518"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=1066518#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1054986" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1054986" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="2uciano"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/181754"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="2uciano" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Acqua-di-Parma/Leather-Eau-de-Parfum-55999.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55999.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Leather Eau de Parfum"title="Leather Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1054986ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1054986" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81); Warm and elegant, probably works best in cool to cold days.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="1054986"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=1054986#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1049053" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/881167">roccodu62</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-04-08">04/08/19 06:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is definitely similar to Tom Ford Tobacco Vanille but a way more refined and easy to wear.<br />
<br />
However, the performance kind of really lack... This is the reason I didn't get a full bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="1049053"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=1049053#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1039067" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1039067" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RichardB"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1178726"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="RichardB" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1039067ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1039067" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1178726">RichardB</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-03-08">03/08/19 09:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a nice honey-tobacco fragrance which is clearly influenced by Tobacco Vanille. I don’t get any citrus at the top. It’s all rum and ginger to me. Then I get the honey and tobacco followed by the nice, clean amberwood and tonka bean. This fragrance is very smooth but I wished the tobacco pushed out a bit more. The ginger note is quite prominent here but executed well. Overall, I like this fragrance (I don’t love it) but I feel you need a cold weather environment for this one to shine. This will be too cloying in hot/warm weather. If you like this one, I think you’ll also like The Blazing Mister Sam and Tragedy of Lord George.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="1039067"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=1039067#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1032172" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1153785">echo4kilo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-11-13">11/13/18 20:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I tried this one on and it smells really nice. Because it came out in 2016 I have to say it smells almost exactly like  Tobacco Vanille. Maybe a bit sweeter. I'm basically copying my review for Tobacco Vaille. To an untrained nose like me, they smell nearly exactly the same. It has very sweet candy smell, I could detect a tea smell, slight but nice tobacco smell. Kind of like black and mild smell. I would wear this at night going out to a nice restaurant. I would definitely like to own a bottle if it was a little less expensive.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="1000651"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=1000651#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent997384" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc997384" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jromas"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/950069"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.950069.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jromas" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Aventus-9828.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9828.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aventus"title="Aventus"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma997384ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd997384" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/950069">Jromas</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-11-03">11/03/18 21:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I’m going to have to agree that it is a play doh version of tabacco vanille. I can’t stand tobacco vanille. But I like this. Has a little gingerbread thrown in there as well. It doesn’t last long though. Thinking about a full bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="997384"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=997384#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent979669" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc979669" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="F2097"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1009212"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="F2097" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma979669ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd979669" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1009212">F2097</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-09-07">09/07/18 12:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Over-composed to the point where it turns into a mess. A horrible grey, playdoh fennel scented, unpleasant experience.<br />
<br />
I feel there are too many of these portrait fragrances now. A lot of them are quite generic and don't seem very much like the classic Penhaligon fragrances.<br />
<br />
Most of them are well made, Lord George and Sohan are the highlights, a lot of the others are passable or have likeable elements.<br />
<br />
This one starts off ok, an over fussy floral. Later it developed into something that seemed like it was trying to be everything at once but failing at it. Metallic, marine, honey, tobacco, floral, aniseed, fruity, it is just too much and too badly composed.<br />
<br />
Like in Nausica where the giant world destroying monster is revived, but too early and it just melts and dies.<br />
<br />
Here we are at the bottom of the barrel. Hopefully Penhaligons will slow down or move on from all these portrait fragrances.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="979669"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=979669#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent971994" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc971994" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tlund"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/119796"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.119796.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tlund" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Comme-des-Garcons/Comme-des-Garcons-2-390.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.390.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Comme des Garcons 2"title="Comme des Garcons 2"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma971994ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd971994" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76); Despite what others have said, the HONEY IS PROMINENT and in A VERY SWEET WAY. Not sure how I feel about it yet, but sweet honey and baby powder is really not my thing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="971994"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=971994#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent963241" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc963241" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bee-young-ka"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/934780"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.934780.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bee-young-ka" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-Girl-Tonic-59732.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.59732.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Wanted Girl Tonic"title="Wanted Girl Tonic"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma963241ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd963241" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/934780">Bee-young-ka</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-07-19">07/19/18 02:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The guy at David Jones was adamant that scent has no gender and picked this out for me to try.<br />
Boozy leather with honey background, tobacco &amp; gingerbread-y.<br />
Yum!<br />
 I don't care if this is supposed to be a "Men's" scent,<br />
It’s wonderful; I wore my sample to the Rocky Horror Show, then went and got a FB.  <br />
I love it, I love it a lot. <br />
<br />
Bottle 10/10      Scent 10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="963241"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=963241#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent959675" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc959675" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jamie81"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/152467"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="jamie81" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Guerlain-Le-Parfum-du-68-21752.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.21752.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Guerlain Le Parfum du 68"title="Guerlain Le Parfum du 68"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma959675ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd959675" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="959675"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=959675#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent955528" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc955528" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tall Mark"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1080104"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1080104.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tall Mark" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma955528ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd955528" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1080104">Tall Mark</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-06-24">06/24/18 17:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just bought a full bottle at fragrance net and have been testing it for the last 7 days.  Well, the good news is the box is nicely designed and the initial smell when sprayed is awesome.  For a parfum I would expect it to last more than 60 seconds before turning into a skin scent, but unfortunately that is what I have experienced. Let me add that my spray routine is about 20 sprays now with Radcliff. I can see a little shimmer of the parfum oil on my arm and wrist after this insane spray routine.  Im trying to get some sort of longevity and silage but even with that many sprays its still a Zero on the longevity.  As a skin scent it will last a few hours.  The scent notes are as advertised, with emphasis on the sweet tobacco, but I also smell a little warm spiciness.  The animalic and rum notes vanish about 30 seconds after the initial spray, and your left with lingering sweet honey tobacco, which is done right.   The bottom line is I feel ripped off because there is absolutely zero longevity or silage.<br />
<br />
scent: 9/10<br />
compliments: 2/10<br />
longevity: 1/10<br />
silage: 1/10<br />
<br />
Summary:  Beautiful overpriced skin scent.  A rip off in nice box, bottle and cap.  TF tobacco vanile will smell almost the same and have better performance. Mancera Red Tobacco will offer similar notes and last longer and get way more compliments in my opinion. .  Nasomatto Baronda is nice rum, spicy pirates of the caribbean scent that might be money better spent.  I own all of the above and am very disappointed with Radcliff.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="955528"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=955528#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent941196" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Not sweet, somewhat smokey on my skin. Not what I expected from the note breakdown. This combines with poor longevity and sillage doesn't make this a bottle worthy purchase.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="935427"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=935427#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent923316" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc923316" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jeffwithfrags"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/115543"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="jeffwithfrags" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/Baccarat-Rouge-540-33519.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.33519.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Baccarat Rouge 540"title="Baccarat Rouge 540"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma923316ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd923316" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/115543">jeffwithfrags</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-03-18">03/18/18 02:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I definitely get sweetish powder but combined with the beeswax and animal themes described above on the accord graph.<br />
<br />
if I smell closely on my skin I do get some smoothness to, and a slight boozy-syrupy theme which get weirder by the hour.<br />
<br />
Was about to pass it off as a general, non-descript sweet powder sponge that ladies use to pad their faces but sadly the smoother syrupy-booze accord never comes off and really dominates and I'm left with the sticky-sweet animalic powdery oddness.<br />
<br />
Not good =/<br />
<br />
Like the honeyed tobacco (both quite faint with mainly the thickness being the vanillic-booze still) towards the end and then slightly more tobacco though, but the animalic accord is too strong at the start<br />
<br />
My rating: 4/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="923316"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=923316#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent922265" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc922265" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ivanus"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1053864"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1053864.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ivanus" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma922265ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd922265" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1053864">Ivanus</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-03-15">03/15/18 10:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Fragrance -Roaring Radcliff Penhaligon`s<br />
Bottle from - 2016<br />
<br />
This fragrance reminds me of a sophisticated,intuitive and profound gentleman with a bit of wilderness in his heart. Roaring Radcliff is an intelligent interpretation of tobacco with a nice touch of spicy gingerbread and finest warm rum sweeten up with honey.I can detect a wisper of vanilla,but it's not listed in the notes.It has some similarities to Tobacco Vanille by Tom Ford.<br />
<br />
Longevity - 10/10(10+ hours)<br />
Silage/Projection - 8,5/10(heavy to moderate projection and silage for the first 3-4 hours)<br />
Weather -Best in autumn and winter <br />
Age - 28+ <br />
Compliments - 7/10<br />
Scent - 8,5/10<br />
<br />
Main notes according to me - tobacco,honey,rum,ginger,tonka bean.<br />
<br />
The drydown is a bit spicy,smokey and moderatly sweet and I get some -rum,tobacco,cinnamon,vanilla and spices. <br />
<br />
Emotions -<br />
dark vibe elegance,sophisticated,intuitive,profound,class.<br />
<br />
Occasion -special occasions,formal and semi-formal events and nights out.<br />
<br />
Definitely will get everyone's attention.Try before you buy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="922265"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=922265#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent910597" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc910597" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="groover"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/613045"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.613045.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="groover" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Baldessarini/Signature-63010.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.63010.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Signature"title="Signature"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma910597ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd910597" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/613045">groover</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-02-11">02/11/18 20:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Roaring Radcliff is a nice<br />
tobacco scent with a slightly<br />
gourmandish vibe, the beesway<br />
and honey combined with rum and<br />
tobacco makes it rather sweet <br />
but never cloying, i think it's<br />
a very nice scent but the price<br />
is rather high for a 75 ml bottle,<br />
and there are tobacco fragrances out<br />
there that projects and lasts way longer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="910597"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=910597#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent908700" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I don't need another.Will not be purchasing a bottle of this</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="908700"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=908700#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent906493" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This is quite weird because the notes are not exactly the same, I guess honey gives the sweetness of vanilla, while tonka plays the role of cacao. Not sure why someone would prefer this to TV, maybe the price or the bottle could be a reason. It is very nice scent whatsoever.<br />
<br />
*This review was written after several full wearings of the perfume and not just after smelling this on paper or on wrist.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="906493"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=906493#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent896982" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/820769">KIZILBAY</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-01-04">01/04/18 20:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Notalara bakıp zengin , güçlü bir tütün odaklı parfüm bekliyorsanız üzülürsünüz. Alakası yok çünkü. Hatta tütün orada mı onu bile anlamak zor. Deri için de aynısı söz konusu. Sadece tonka on planda. Notalar çok hoş görünüyor ama sonuç oyle değil. Sise güzel ama parfüm bence vasat çizgisinde kalmış.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="896982"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=896982#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent893912" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc893912" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Houdini4"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/607493"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.607493.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Houdini4" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Les-Indemodables/Vanille-Havane-Coeur-de-Oud-96892.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.96892.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanille Havane Coeur de Oud"title="Vanille Havane Coeur de Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma893912ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd893912" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/607493">Houdini4</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-12-27">12/27/17 04:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a decent scent and I’m not just saying that because of my usual enjoyment of all things Penhaligons, it really is. <br />
Starts out with a new approach which is typical of the house, complex yet understated and apart from fruity top notes and a tobacco/Tonka general nature, it’s something I hadn’t really come across before. However, after the first few minutes it settles and completely changes to a honied, more powdery but ultimately the same scent as TF Tobacco Vanille. I haven’t got a problem with this and even less so for two reasons, it’s not exactly the same and that it has a different opening and drydown, which we will get to in a moment. The problem is that on the whole is this a better fragrance than TV? I don’t really think so. It doesn’t quite have the same balls out strength although the longevity was excellent to be fair. The drydown was much more Tonka bean and a sweeter more playful vanilla than the Tom Ford. <br />
So in conclusion interesting opening which fools you into thinking it’s not a clone of TV, then the heart of it IS TV, then the drydown reminds you it isn’t with some softer, refined tones. A good effort, worth trying but I won’t be buying it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="893912"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=893912#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent884711" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; To date my favourite scent!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="884711"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=884711#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent878398" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc878398" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JamiesonB"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1067719"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="JamiesonB" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.472.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Silver Mountain Water"title="Silver Mountain Water"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma878398ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd878398" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1067719">JamiesonB</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-11-08">11/08/17 06:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tried this out today along with Mac Velvet Teddy as I'm looking at tobacco/honey frags at the mo and these 2 were recommended.<br />
Well, what to say about this one? <br />
Its stunning, plain and simple. <br />
Almost as complex as Back To Black with a sublime Tobacco/Honey/Cardamom type opening, a tad boozy, although I couldn't detect specifically rum but definitely a cognac type thing going on, a touch of something floral, all combined beautifully to provide a rich, smooth, smouldering opening.<br />
20-30 mins in and the honey and tobacco take centre stage, with the odd waft of leather and Christmas spice joining in for good measure. Totally sublime.<br />
HOWEVER, this wonderful experience lasts but a fleeting moment as inside 3 hours this died down to nothing more than a very faint skin scent on me.<br />
I was so disappointed as it smells incredible but alas I will not be buying a bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43037"comment_id="878398"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Roaring-Radcliff-43037.html?ccid=878398#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent873535" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
